DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness auto-acupressure ( digital pressure point acupuncture ) add conventional treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Auto-acupressure : Effectiveness Diminishing Neck Pain Benign Origin
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE : To evaluate effectiveness digital pressure point acupuncture add conventional treatment diminish pain patient cervicalgia benign origin . MATERIAL AND METHODS : Pragmatic control randomized clinical trial . Patients diagnosis cervicalgia benign origin include . They randomly assign receive conventional treatment plus auto-acupressure . The professional receive instruction Centres Health experience acupuncture professional supervise , workshop , right application technique , consist application manoeuvre auto-acupressure patient period 10 minute , day one week . The pain intensity evaluate mean millimetric scale 10 cm ( 0 represent pain absence , 10 maximum imaginable pain , Numerical Scale Rating ) . The pain measure inclusion day 1 , 3 , 7 , 30 90 . The sample size calculate detect minimum difference 1.5 point ( DS 2 ) scale pain day 7 , implies recruitment , least , 80 patient group ( loss n't exceed 20 % ) . Also perception quality life ( euroQol-5D ) functional capacity scale Oswestry evaluate , begin , day 3 , 7 , 30 90 . The measure point group compare control intervention . The evolution repeat measure compare group generalize estimate equation ( GEE ) model .
DOC.criteria: Patients come consultation Primary Care neck pain without structural hurt irradiation , muscular contraction functional postural limitation .
